channel.title: DibiaseMMO
channel.description:
Hello, I Helped Develop A Game For A Friend, Made Completely Of Php And Mysql.
[b]Currently:[/b] Having Mysql Issues
Here Is The Description
Welcome to [b]DibiaseMMO[/b] ! This is a free massively multiplayer mafia game.
[b]*Please note*[/b] We are strict on cheating - Do not share a computer or have more than 1 account. Anything the GameAdmins consider CHEATING will result in your account being FROZEN . Also please use common sense when choosing your name because if it has racial remarks or profanity then you will have to make a new account. This is a game and meant to be fun, good luck!
[b]DibiaseMMO[/b] is a browser based game which means there is nothing to download or install! Play a little or play a lot. Just remember to watch your back.
Enter a world of corruption and death. A world where no second thought is taken when eliminating an adversary. Become a pimp and command a private army of mercenaries and use their services to enforce your agenda.
Create organizations and forge alliances to fight common enemies.Ghost those who oppose, bless those who obey, and expand your empire in [b]DibiaseMMO[/b].
You start as a two-bit hustler on the street with no respect. Respect has to be earned in this world, and respect is spelled m-u-s-c-l-e.
This is [b]DibiaseMMO[/b] -- where hustlers become a pimp and become floating corpses all in the same night.
The pimp with the highest networth rules [b]DibiaseMMO[/b] and wins the cash prize, while the top ranking Mafia families also win prizes. Create your own Mafia organization with other live mafiosos.
Be the smartest, Be the strongest, Be a [b]DibiaseMMO[/b] Pimp.
~INFO~ This Is A Mafia Style Game Based On Turns. You Can Use Credits To Get You More Turns. You Can Buy Credits, Or Refer People For Free Credits. The More Credits You Buy, The More Extra You Get.
~Here Is A Guide On Buying Credits~ [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/3782/11bd5.png[/img] Click This To Purchase Credits
[img]http://img381.imageshack.us/img381/4570/111wi4.png[/img] Select An Offer To Buy Yourself Credits, Or Buy A Friend Credits.
~OTHER~ Game:
Hope you enjoy.

Could contain porn.
